other_tests.findings: Tests for paraneoplastic antibodies in the blood and CSF were negative. CSF was clear and normal in color, glucose level was 66 mg/dl, total protein was 33 mg/dl, total nucleated cell count was 1 per mm3 with 59% lymphocytes and 41% monocytes.
A single sharp wave in the left parietal region but was otherwise normal.
Marked spongiform degeneration in the basal ganglia, thalamus, and cerebellum; gliosis and neuronal dropout present; no kuru plaques identified.
